name: Man
line: Hey, golf is easy now!

name: Man
line: Aahh! Golf is hard again! Golf is hard agaaaaaaain!

name: Terry
line: The view here is the same as yours, Jim. A giant head has entered Earth’s gravity, triggering climate change and natural disasters we thought were impossible for at least another eight years.

name: Jim
line: (in news studio) Let’s not make this political, Terry. Do we know what this giant head wants?

name: Giant Head
line: SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT.

name: Terry
line: Jim, you heard *static* said, “Show me what you got.”

name: Giant Head
line: SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT. I WANT TO SEE WHAT YOU GOT. (lamp post falls over, Terry runs out of frame)

name: Rick
line: Oh boy. Time to go, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Uhh, where?

name: Rick
line: The Pentagon. I mean, not THE Pentagon. *burp* The lame one, here on Earth.

name: Summer
line: Is it God? If it’s God, do we get out of school?

name: Beth
line: It’s not God, Summer.

name: Jerry
line: She’s allowed to think it’s God if she wants, honey!

name: Beth
line: Shut up, Jerry.

name: Jerry
line: Ok…

name: Beth
line: Dad, what do you know about this?

name: Rick
line: Morty and I are going to look into it. You guys hold tight.

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Scary stuff, huh? Pretty freaky. Hi, I’m Morty’s math teacher. I’m also part of the street team inviting folks to the church downtown so we can pray together.

name: Beth
line: How is praying going to help?

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Ma’am, a giant head in the sky is controlling the weather. Did you wanna play checkers? Let’s be rational! I’ll see you at God’s house! (leaves)

name: President
line: Gentlemen, gentlemen, one at a time! Simon?

name: Simon
line: SETI, NORAD, and every broadcaster on the planet are attempting to show this being what humanity’s got. String theory, world history, the human genome.

name: Nathan
line: Have you tried sending it launch codes? Mr. President, what America’s got is 70,000 megatons of KABOOM-BOOM! And I say we show it right up this floating head’s ass!

name: Guards
line: Hold it! Don’t move! (they approach Rick and Morty with guns)

name: Rick
line: Stay back! This watch turns people into snakes!

name: President
line: Stand down. Everybody stand down! I’m the leader of these people and I’m unarmed. There’s no need for any more snake-makery.

name: Rick
line: My name is Rick Sanchez. This here’s my grandson Morty. (drinks from flask)

name: Everyone
line: Hi, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Hey.

name: Rick
line: I’ve seen enough of the galaxy to know that what we’ve got here is a Cromulon from the Cygnus-5 Expanse. So you can forget about nukes, and you can forget about math. (points to viewscreen showing floating head) This head won’t go away until *burp* Earth shows them it’s got a hit song.

name: Everyone
line: Seriously, that’s impossible, etc…

name: Simon
line: You mean like Vivaldi?

name: Rick
line: No, Frasier. A live performance of a newly-written, catchy, original song. The Cromulon feed on the talent and showmanship of less-evolved lifeforms.

name: President
line: All right, all right. Thank you, Mr. Sanchez. Change of plan, people. Get me Pharrell, Randy Newman, Billy Corgan, and The-Dream. (no one responds) The-Dream? He wrote “Umbrella” and “Single Ladies”? You people haven’t heard of The-Dream?

name: Rick
line: You’re gonna wanna put them on that giant speaker system at your sonic testing facility at Area 51.

name: Nathan
line: How do you know about that?

name: President
line: For God’s sake, Nathan, the man turns people into snakes. He can use Google Maps.

name: Aide
line: Sir! Pharrell, Newman, Corgan, and that Dream guy. They’re all dead.

name: President
line: What? How is that possible? Do people just die when I name them?

name: Aide
line: The Grammys, sir. There was an earthquake and all the musicians... (sniffs, holding back tears) All the famous ones, they’re gone.

name: President
line: Dear God.

name: Aide
line: Hold on, sir, just a minute. Ice-T survived. He’s inbound on an F-15, ETA two hours.

name: Rick
line: Good luck, Mr. President.

name: Simon
line: Sir, the magnetic poles are about to reverse. In two hours, there may not be an Earth to save.

name: President
line: Sanchez! Are you a musician?

name: Rick
line: I dabble, Mr. President.

name: President
line: Get this man and his grandson on a Blackhawk to Area 51.

name: Father Bob
line: People! Everyone! Remain calm! Every crisis of faith is an opportunity for more faith! When God deals you an 11, you don’t fold! You double down, and always hit on a soft 16. That means you, Jews.

name: Jew
line: I beg your pardon, pastor, but the last I looked outside, it seems to be you that’s been dealt the weak hand. Jews rule! (no one responds) Nobody? Ok, tough church.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Hi, Principal Vagina. The name’s real, possibly Scandinavian. I’m just gonna come out and make this pitch. The old gods are dead. Fuck all previous existing religions. All hail the one true god, the giant head in the sky.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Ah, di di di di. (to Bob) Bob, Bob, I get it. But unless this (holds up a necklace with a cross) can beat that… what have you done for me lately? (tosses necklace to Bob) So if you wanna excuse me, I’m going out on the sidewalk and dropping to my knees and pledging my eternal soul to the thing that literally controls the fucking weather! (walks out) Outta my way!

name: Pastor Bob
line: Ok, if sanity’s been restored to this assembly, I’d like to talk about the cost of repairing our new organ. Sally, the plate, please.

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: (holds up a dollar) Ohhhh, this is my favorite part!

name: (Helicopters over the desert, subtitle “Nevada Desert
line: Restricted Air Space”. Rick and Morty are on a helicopter)

name: Morty
line: Rick, are you really a musician?

name: Rick
line: Who’s NOT a musician, Morty?

name: Morty
line: Me!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, not with that attitude.

name: Jump Master
line: We’re in the drop zone! I’m the jump master! My name’s Jamey! With an E-Y! Go, go, go! (Rick slides down rope)

name: Morty
line: B-b-but we don’t have a song!

name: Principal Vagina
line: Giant head in the sky, please forgive all that we’ve done. We’re sorry for increased levels of emissions and our racism. And of course, the amber alerts I keep ignoring on my phone.

name: Rick and Morty
line: WhooooOOOOAHHHH!!!!

name: Rick
line: (picks up a microphone) All right, Morty, let’s get ready to do it! Why don’t you, uh, find a button on one of those keyboards and lay down some kind of beat?

name: Morty
line: Rick, I think we need to cut our losses. We get our family and portal out of here!

name: Rick
line: Morty! Good music comes from people who are relaxed. Just hit a button, Morty! Gimme a beat!

name: Morty
line: Oh man, ok, all right, um…

name: Rick
line: Ahhhhh yeahhhhh

name: Nathan
line: Get… schwifty? What the hell is that?

name: President
line: It’s our world’s best effort, that’s what.

name: Rick
line: Take off your pants and your panties

name: Nathan
line: Mr. Bulldops?

name: President
line: Don’t analyze it, Nathan. It’s working!

name: Rick
line: Take a shit on the floor

name: Pastor Bob
line: And third-level donors get our all access family pass.

name: Summer
line: Listen! The storm is stopping!

name: Rick
line: Hey, take your pants off

name: Giant Head
line: Hmmmm.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Please be kind to us for we are but tiny things with entire bodies stuck to your ground.

name: Giant Head
line: I LIKE WHAT YOU GOT. GOOD JOB.

name: Beth
line: Now hold on a second, let’s be rational about this.

name: Beth
line: No, I’m… I’m just saying, we don’t know if there’s a cause-effect relationship --

name: Beth
line: Oh, God, what’s going on now?

name: President
line: What the hell happened?

name: Aide
line: Mr. President, you’re gonna wanna see this.

name: Rick
line: I think planet Earth has just been transported.

name: Principal Vagina
line: The head has left and sent its children!

name: Beth
line: Holy CRAP!

name: Summer
line: Oh dear giant head, we apologize for that discussion! It will never happen again!

name: Simon
line: Sir, we’ve started picking up on a garbled signal. We’re decrypting it now.

name: Cromulon
line: WE ASKED THEM TO SHOW US WHAT THEY GOT. AND THEY DID. NOW WE’LL SEE WHICH OF THEM HAS GOT THE MOST. 24 HOURS, FIVE PLANETS, FIVE SONGS. BUT IN THE END, THERE CAN ONLY BE ONE. PLANET MUSIC! All participation is involuntary. Disqualified and losing planets are disintegrated by plasma ray.

name: Rick
line: Uhh, it’s probably a bad time to mention it, but any astronauts you guys had in orbit are definitely dead.

name: Cromulon
line: Welcome back to Planet Music! First up, let’s hear the latest song from planet Parblesnops. The Greebybobes! SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT.

name: Greebybobe
line: Hold it, hold it, stop! Music isn’t about competition or captivity! If you love music, you love freedom. Let these worlds be free, please!

name: Cromulon
line: DISQUALIFIED!

name: Cromulon
line: There’s one every season. Moving on to planet Arbolez Meterosos. Arbolian Meterososians. SHOW US WHAT YOU GOT.

name: Arbolian Meterososian
line: Ah two, three, four…

name: Aide
line: Rick, Morty, Ice-T. The timetable’s moved up. Earth’s on in six hours.

name: Morty
line: Like we’re not already under enough pressure! (Morty flips a bowl of peanuts at the aide and it hits him in the head. The aide leaves.)

name: Rick and Ice-T
line: Whoa ho ho ho ho!

name: Rick
line: Geez, Morty. The guy’s just doing his job. Take it easy.

name: Morty
line: Rick, Ice-T, could you guys take it less easy?! We’ve got six hours to come up with a song!

name: Rick
line: Genius happens in the moment, Morty. (walks over to keyboard)

name: Morty
line: Well, can we at least go get our family? You know, so we can take them with-with-with us if we lose?

name: Rick
line: That’s planning for failure, Morty. Even dumber than regular planning. (presses a button on the keyboard) Balls.

name: Rick
line: Morty, Morty, stop! Listen! There’s only so much charge left in this thing. If we portal home from here and back, we’re not gonna have enough charge left to get off-world. Get it?

name: Morty
line: What?!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, *burp* you see, I try to shelter you from certain realities, *burp* Morty. Cause if I let you make me nervous, then we can’t get schwifty.

name: Morty
line: Stop saying it like it’s a thing! You made it up!

name: Rick
line: Hey, Morty! Could you lick my… (Rick presses keys on the keyboard with the sample of him saying “Balls”)

name: Morty
line: Rick, cut it out! That’s not funny, Rick!

name: Nathan
line: I’ve seen enough. These guys are one-hit wonders.

name: President
line: And what’s your plan, General?

name: Nathan
line: We still have the nuclear option. On my word, we can launch a nuclear missile at every one of those heads in the sky.

name: President
line: Our planet’s held captive on a live game show and your solution is to shoot the audience? You can put your faith in nukes if we get through this, General. Until then, I’ll put mine in Rick and Morty. “Get Schwifty” was a jam.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Hello? Yes sir, yeah. Thank you sir, thank you. He says he’s proud of what we’re doing and hopes we have a great Ascension Festival! Happy Ascension!

name: All
line: Happy Ascension!

name: Beth
line: We should pack up and leave town now.

name: Jerry
line: I think it’s inspiring that our community is coping with fear in a way that involves a festival and homemade ice cream. If you’d stop being such an evangelical atheist, you might start enjoying yourself.

name: Jerry
line: Whoa! Look at you! You’re wearing the hat and everything!

name: Summer
line: Here’s yours! (puts hat on Jerry) Mom, do you mind if I cook dinner tonight?

name: Beth
line: Yeah, sure. Wait, what??

name: Summer
line: I love you guys. You gave me life. And it’s the will of the many heads that all children honor their parents.

name: Beth
line: Dinner sounds nice.

name: Ethan
line: Pardon, Mr. and Mrs. Smith. Summer, are you coming to the Ascension?

name: Summer
line: Father, can we please go to the Ascension?

name: Jerry
line: Sure! Let’s go to the Ascension. Wh-wh-what is it?

name: Principal Vagina
line: We hereby send these un-wantables skyward that they might be inhaled by the many heads, later to be sneezed back to us as better babies! (cuts first rope) Headward, free now to rise. (cuts second rope) Headward, free now to rise. (cuts third rope) Headward, free now to rise.

name: Summer
line: Oh yes, yes! Rise to the giant head! You are free to be free!

name: Ice-T
line: A squeegee comes up from the garage, right? And he’s got a lobster in one hand and movie tickets in the other. He’s like, “I’m ready!”

name: Ice-T
line: Who would take a lobster to see Iron Man 3?

name: Ice-T
line: Aw, damn. We’re out of original flavor Fig Newtons. I should get going anyway.

name: Rick
line: Wait, wait, wait! Come on, h-hold on a second!

name: Morty
line: What?!

name: Ice-T
line: Damn. You didn’t tell me you fuck around with portals and shit.

name: Morty
line: That’s it!

name: Rick
line: Whoa, whoa! Morty! Give me that!

name: Morty
line: You lied! You lied about the charge! You were just being lazy! Get back! Sit down!

name: Rick
line: Morty, just put it down. You don’t know what you’re doing.

name: Morty
line: I’m going to go find Mom and Dad.

name: Rick
line: Nooooo!

name: Rick
line: Ahhhh, shit!

name: President
line: Ah, shit.

name: Morty
line: Ahhh, shit.

name: Summer
line: And then Ethan played guitar and we learned the Seven Contemplations of the Head by singing them. It was really fun. Praise be the head!

name: Jerry and Beth
line: Praise be the…

name: Jerry
line: Yeah.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Hi folks, Head Priest Vagina. Thanks for farming all those potatoes. It’s 6 p.m., so if you’re a parent, you’re now entitled to adoration from your children.

name: Summer
line: I’m going to start dinner! (walks into the house)

name: Beth
line: I don’t know what to say. Summer is doing really well here.

name: Jerry
line: She’s aced every test in potato class, and look how important potatoes have become.

name: Beth
line: She’s not getting pregnant or doing drugs or missing curfew…

name: Balloon Man
line: Please help me! You can reach me if you try. Please help me!!

name: Beth
line: That’s not our business as long as Summer is thriving!

name: Summer
line: Taco time! (Summer pulls off the lid to reveal exactly 12 tacos.) I hope it pleases you as the head desires.

name: Beth
line: That’s wonderful, Summer!

name: Jerry
line: We’re so proud of you. But honestly, you don’t have to make dinner every night.

name: Summer
line: Of course I do, silly! (gasps and drops lid) Oh my God, daddy, I’m sorry I called you silly! I’m so sorry! (turns around and drops to knees) Heavenly head and cranial creator! Forgive my transgressions against family and community! May my chores complete me as I complete them!

name: Birdperson
line: Morty.

name: Morty
line: Birdperson?

name: Birdperson
line: You appear to be dying. I will make efforts to prevent this, but can promise nothing.

name: Rick
line: Wh-What do you think, Ice? Probably a little over-developed.

name: Ice-T
line: Shit. Over-developed, under-developed. Bad songs are bad songs.

name: Rick
line: Well, do you think maybe, could you give me some help with it, or… ?

name: Ice-T
line: Ah, hell no, man. You do your thing, but I can’t afford to get my pride wrapped up in your shame. You know what I’m sayin’?

name: Rick
line: Ice, I don’t want to be a negative Nelly or anything, but *burp* if Morty doesn’t come back with my portal gun and I eat it out there, it’s, uh, kind of your problem too.

name: Ice-T
line: Pfff. I ain’t worried about no Earth blowin’ up, man.

name: Rick
line: What? Why not?

name: Ice-T
line: Yo, this is why.

name: Rick
line: What the fuck? You can turn into ice?

name: Ice-T
line: My story begins at the dawn of time in the far away realm of Alphabetrium. There, every being is a letter of the alphabet. But I was frozen and exiled to the cosmos by my elders as punishment for not caring enough about anything. Earth is just one of the many stops on my lifelong journey with no destination. So you better believe I don’t care if it blows up! Cause I’ll just be ice, floatin’ through space, like a comet!

name: Rick
line: Take it from me, Ice. *burp* You can’t just *burp* float around space not caring about stuff forever.

name: Ice-T
line: Pshhhh. Man, watch me. Good luck, Rick.

name: President
line: Ok, things are getting out of hand. I better make sure Rick has everything he needs to “get schwifty.”

name: Nathan
line: Oh, for God’s sake, that’s enough.

name: President
line: What the hell are you doing, Nathan? I’m the goddamn President of the United fuckin’ States!

name: Nathan
line: I’m setting the nuclear option to launch one minute into Earth’s performance. And you, Mr. President, I hope you like being hit in the face with a gun!

name: President
line: Wait, wait, wait, why-why --

name: Birdperson
line: I believe I can access the history of Rick’s gun and help you get back to him.

name: Morty
line: But can you help me get to my family? You know, at my house?

name: Birdperson
line: Is your intention to abandon Rick using his own portal gun? In bird culture, this is considered a dick move.

name: Morty
line: All of Rick’s moves are dick moves! Wh-what am I eating? What is this, bird seed?

name: Birdperson
line: It is random debris. I found it in my carpet. I don’t know what humans eat.

name: Tammy
line: You know what THIS human eats!

name: Birdperson
line: Don’t be gross, Tammy.

name: Tammy
line: (leans over to Morty and whispers) Bird… dick.

name: Morty
line: Tammy… gross. Birdperson, you always stick up for Rick, but he doesn’t care about anyone but himself. He doesn’t think about the consequences of anything he does.

name: Birdperson
line: And as a result, he has the power to save or destroy entire worlds. And he is the reason you and I know each other. And the reason I’m alive at all.

name: Morty
line: What’s that? Who’s that baby?

name: Birdperson
line: Morty, suppose you could retrieve your family from Earth but had to abandon Rick. I could give your loved ones shelter on Birdworld, even jobs, possibly as worm ranchers. How often do you think you might look up at the stars and wonder what might have been had you just put your faith in Rick?

name: Cromulon
line: That was Chunky Tunk with “Full Ming Mong, Empty Gorp Dorp.” Up next, planet Earth!

name: Morty
line: Oh God! We’re up?!?!

name: Principal Vagina
line: Jerry and Beth, your family is a golden example of what Headism has to offer the world.

name: Beth
line: The world?

name: Principal Vagina
line: Headism is a hit. We’re taking it worldwide and would like Jerry to be our church’s “Head” of Advertising.

name: Jerry
line: You… would?

name: Principal Vagina
line: Beth, we’d like to promote you from horse surgeon, straight past human surgeon, to “Head” of Medicine.

name: Beth
line: That’s my dream! That’s my dream.

name: Jerry
line: Thank you. This is all so overwhelming, but, uh… we can’t.

name: Beth
line: Absolutely not.

name: Principal Vagina
line: I’m sorry?

name: Beth
line: We’ve been waiting 16 years for our daughter to respect us, but the key is, it has to be “our” daughter, not this person she’s become.

name: Jerry
line: We’ll take our chances raising her without fancy new jobs outside of a potato-based religion. (turns and puts his hands on Beth’s shoulders) And you know what? I’m sick of pretending that we’re together because of the kids in the first place! I married you because you’re the love of my life!

name: Beth
line: (puts her hands on Jerry’s sides) And I‘m lucky to have you and I never tell you that! You know, we will come out of this stronger as a family!

name: (Cut
line: Summer has tied Beth and Jerry to ropes and balloons outside.)

name: Beth
line: Please don’t do this, please don’t do this! Summer!

name: Jerry
line: Summer, listen carefully. I stole a paper clip and I have it in my cheek but I don’t know what to do with it and it hurts.

name: Summer
line: You’re going to be ok! (ties another balloon to them) You will come back as babies!

name: Jerry
line: I AM a baby! I’m a baby NOW!

name: Morty
line: Hello? Is anybody here? (looks through the studio window and sees the President tied up) Mr. President!

name: President
line: This is Bluebird. Code tango-niner-alpha. Abort launch. Abort! Hello? (releases button) He’s blocked me out.

name: Morty
line: Sir, I need to get to the stage and help Rick get schwifty!

name: President
line: It won’t matter how schwifty you get, Morty. The General’s got nukes set to launch halfway through Earth’s song!

name: Morty
line: Oh my God! C-c-can you fly a Blackhawk?

name: President
line: Can the Pope’s dick fit through a donut?

name: Morty
line: Uhhh, I’m not sure?

name: President
line: Exactly!

name: Cromulon
line: SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT.

name: Rick
line: Ahem. (starts a low-key, bouncy song) Uhhh… lop-oo-lop-oo-lop-oo-dups, nop-oo-nop-oo-nop-oo-nuts.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Headward free now to rise!

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Hey! Look at the heads! Looks like the heads are gettin’ angry!

name: President
line: I’m really bad at this, Morty! There are way too many buttons on this thing!

name: Morty
line: Mr. President, if I’ve learned one thing today, it’s that sometimes, you have to not give a fuck!

name: Rick
line: Nup-oo-nup-oo-nup-oo-nups… ooh, tough crowd.

name: Principal Vagina
line: I’m sure that has… that has nothing to do with this.

name: Summer
line: The heads are displeased! (She jumps and grabs Beth and Jerry’s legs.)

name: Ethan
line: Summer! (He jumps and grabs her.)

name: Rick
line: Morty!

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: The heads love this! They love it when we DON’T kill the Smith family!

name: Principal Vagina
line: No! Stop that! You’re not allowed to interpret the will of the heads!

name: President
line: Call off the nuclear strike! This is the President. Stop the nuclear missile launch!

name: Nathan
line: Just launch the missiles!

name: Cromulon
line: BOO! NOT COOL!

name: Principal Vagina
line: I’m the only one that speaks to the heads!

name: Cromulon
line: DISQUALIFIED!

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: The heads disqualified Vagina! Get him!

name: Cromulon
line: DISQUALIFIED! DISQUALIFIED!

name: All
line: Ice-T?

name: Ice-T
line: That’s right, it’s me, Ice-T! I care now! You made me care more! With all due respect, I’d like to hear what Rick and Morty have to play.

name: Morty
line: What do you say, Rick?

name: Rick
line: I say… (grabs mic) Let’s do it!

name: Rick
line: All right!

name: Morty
line: Ohhhh yeahhhh!

name: Rick
line: Come on, here we go!

name: Morty
line: Ohhhh yeahhhh!

name: Rick
line: Say it with me!

name: All
line: Head bent over

name: Principal Vagina
line: Ohhh my GOOOOODDDD!!!

name: All
line: Head bent over (yeah)

name: Cromulon
line: After 988 seasons of Planet Music, the Cromulons have decided to declare Earth the final winner and bring our musical reality show to a conclusion. Goodbye!

name: All
line: Yeah, we did it!

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Did he just say “musical reality show”?

name: Jerry
line: Yeah, it’s possible that we may have been correlating some things that weren’t actually related at all.

name: Principal Vagina
line: HEEEEELLLLPPPP!!!!!

name: Beth
line: We should go get him.

name: President
line: I hope I can call on you again if we need you, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Sure thing! And I was kinda hoping that I could get a selfie with you?

name: President
line: Actually, if you try to tell anyone what happened here, we’ll deny it and probably worse.

name: Morty
line: Understood.

name: Nathan
line: DIIIIEEEE!!!!

name: President
line: Why didn’t he turn into a snake?

name: Rick
line: Trade secret, Mr. President. Particle beam in a wristwatch… snake holster on the leg.

name: President
line: I love this man!

name: (On Alphabetrium, Ice-T enters a great hall containing his elders
line: a grey J, a gaseous F with a female face, and a Q made of lava. All three are holding different scepters.)

name: Ice-T
line: Magnesium-J, Hydrogen-F. Father.

name: Magnesium-J
line: Word of your selfless acts on the Earth planet have travelled across the galaxy.

name: Ice-T
line: I have changed. I am ready to rejoin my brethren on Alphabetrium.

name: Magnesium-J
line: Very well. Your exile ends today!

name: Magnesium-J
line: Welcome home... Water-T.

name: Purple-P
line: The Numbericons! They’re attacking!

name: Magnesium-J
line: Battle stations!

name: Water-T
line: Father!

name: Magma-Q
line: I love you son. I should have never turned you to ice. (He dies.)

name: Magnesium-J
line: Water-T, where are you going? There’s too many of them!

name: Water-T
line: Then I better crunch the numbers.

name: (Water-T bursts out of the door shooting at several Numbericons. The frame freezes mid-action and we hear gunshots and screaming. A title appears
line: “This summer
